title: wirelessly
extract: using a system of radio signals rather than wires: send/transmit sth wirelessly The Enhanced Driver's License can transmit data wirelessly. communicate/connect wirelessly The hearing aid lets users connect wirelessly to MP3 devices. a wirelessly controlled device.
